title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds, 2 purples, and brown applied by pen or brush.  Madder dyed. Blue painted over resist. Yellow painted by brush.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 55 x 39.5 cm (21 5/8 x 15 9/16 in.)
description: Curving vines with alternately symmetrical bouquets. Isolated motifs of animals, birds and plants.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds, 2 purples, and brown applied by pen or brush.  Madder dyed. Blue painted over resist. Yellow painted by brush.. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-11.
